data.title: Is Animal Crossing worth it without going online?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 3): To a degree. I started ACNH without online. And the actual process of inviting villagers and building your island is quite engaging.

But you have to play cleaver, save anything that you think may be of use.

Apart from island design and villager hunting, you can spend time filli...
